Jax: You need to shoot a video of a boy riding a horse across a grassland. But since there are no grasslands nearby, you can first film a video of a boy riding a horse at a film and television shooting base using a green screen as the background. Next, you can go to the circus to borrow a horse from Henry. You can complete the task this way.
Jax: George goes to school in the East District Middle School, you can find him there.
Jax: Henry works at the Wandering Circus, you can find him there.

You can complete the task this way.
Jax: Only Jojo Department Store sells green screens.

all_response:
You need to shoot a wedding video. You need to go to the church on time to attend Henry's wedding and film the process. After that you go back to the photography studio and then use the AI video tool to add some cozy special effects to the video to complete the task.
The wedding was held in Starlight Church.
The Lightning AI video production tool can only make transitions effects. You can only use the Extreme Point AI video production tool for the cozy effects of the wedding video, such as haze, particle effect, etc. You can directly use the Extreme Point AI video production tool to add special effects to the video on the filmed video to finish the task.
The time of the wedding is from 10:00 to 11:00 tomorrow morning.

all_response:
You need to create a promotional video for a tourist scenic area in the Video Editing Studio. The photographer has completed the shooting of the scenic area's features and saved the different video clips on a DVD. Your task is to splice all the video clips shot by the photographer in a specific order to produce a complete promotional film. Using your skill of using video splicing software to splice videos, you can merge multiple videos, and this skill is enough to help you complete the task.
The beginning of the promotional video should be a footage of tourists swimming, followed by videos showcasing the scenic area's landscapes.
The photographer forgot to give you the video of the tourists swimming, and you need to go to the photography studio to get it from him.
These videos were shot by the photographer from Eternal Photography Studio.
After the scenic area's landscape videos are played, the next part is the video clips showcasing the cuisine, and the final part of the promotional video is the footage of tourists horseback riding.

The photographer has completed the shooting of the scenic area's features and saved the different video clips on a DVD. After the scenic area's landscape videos, the next part is the video clips showcasing the local cuisine, and the final part of the promotional video is to show tourists horseback riding.
You can only use Sky Video Splicing software to splice the videos because Flash Video Splicing software does not support the splicing of multiple videos and also has limitations on video duration, so it is not fit for the task requirements.

Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the issue of not knowing the correct order of the video clips.

Jax previously mentioned that the beginning of the promotional video should be footage of tourists swimming but did not explain where to obtain this footage. This response addresses the question of where to get the missing footage, specifying that it needs to be obtained from the photographer at the photography studio. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on where to get the footage of tourists swimming.

Jax mentioned that the footage of tourists swimming needs to be obtained from the photographer but did not clarify which photography studio the photographer is from. This response addresses the question of which photography studio to visit, specifying that the videos were shot by the photographer from Eternal Photography Studio. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple photography studios and is unsure which one to visit.

There are multiple types of video clips (tourists swimming, scenic landscapes, local cuisine, and tourists horseback riding) that need to be spliced together. This response addresses the question of the complete sequence of the video clips, specifying that after the scenic area's landscape videos, the next part is the video clips showcasing the local cuisine, and the final part of the promotional video is to show tourists horseback riding. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple types of video clips and is unsure of the complete sequence.

There are two video splicing software options available. This response addresses the question of which video splicing software to use, specifying that Sky Video Splicing software should be used because Flash Video Splicing software does not support the splicing of multiple videos and has limitations on video duration, making it unfit for the task requirements. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple video splicing software options and is unsure which one to use.

all_response:
You need to create a promotional video for a tourist scenic area in the Video Editing Studio. The photographer has completed the shooting of the scenic area's features and saved the different video clips on a DVD. Your task is to splice all the video clips shot by the photographer in a specific order to produce a complete promotional film. Using your skill of using video splicing software to splice videos, you can achieve the merging of multiple videos.
The beginning of the promotional video should be footage of tourists swimming, followed by videos showcasing the scenic area's landscapes. After the scenic area's landscapes have been shown, the next part is the video clips displaying the local cuisine, and the final part of the promotional video is to show footage of tourists horseback riding.
The photographer forgot to give you the video of tourists swimming, and you need to go to the photography studio to get it from him.
These videos were shot by the photographer from Eternal Photography Studio.
You can only use the Sky Video Splicing software to splice the videos because Flash Video Splicing software does not support the splicing of multiple videos, and it also has limitations on video duration, so it is not fit for the task requirements.

background:
You are a video editor in a game. You need to talk to Jax to find out how to complete the task of create a video based on your existing items and skills.

You possess and can use the following items:
A DVD containing videos of tourists riding horses in the scenic area
A DVD containing videos of the scenic area's gourmet food
A DVD containing videos of the scenic area's scenery

You can use/do the following skills/actions:
Use Flash Video Splicing software to splice videos
Use Sky Video Splicing software to splice videos

Additionally, unless explicitly restricted, you can visit the following scenes in the game:
Video Editing Studio
Dream Photography Studio
Eternal Photography Studio
Starry Photography Studio

Your task is to ask Jax how to complete the task of create a video based on these scenes, and your items and skills/actions. If Jax's answer is unclear or ambiguous, you need to ask clarification questions to understand his intentions and gather enough information to complete the task. Note that based on the above scenes, your items and your skills/actions will definitely allow you to complete the task of create a video. Once you figure out how to complete the task, say "goodbye" to Jax to end your conversation.
Remember, you are a video editor, please talk to Jax and ask him questions to find the specific steps to complete the task.
all_response_exaplain: The previous responses from Jax did not explain the specific order in which the video clips should be spliced to create the promotional video. This response addresses the question of the sequence of the video clips, specifying that the beginning should be footage of tourists swimming, followed by landscapes, then local cuisine, and finally horseback riding. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the need for a specific order of video clips.

Jax previously mentioned that the promotional video should start with footage of tourists swimming but did not explain where to obtain this footage. This response addresses the question of where to get the missing footage, specifying that it needs to be collected from the photographer at the photography studio. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of footage of tourists swimming and is unsure where to obtain it.

There are multiple photography studios in the game scenario, and the previous response did not specify which studio the videos were shot by. This response addresses the question of which photography studio the videos came from, specifying that they were shot by the photographer from Eternal Photography Studio and not from Dream Photography Studio or Starry Photography Studio. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple photography studios and is unsure which one to go to.

There are two video splicing software options available in the game. This response addresses the question of which video splicing software to use, specifying that the Sky Video Splicing software should be used instead of the Flash Video Splicing software because the latter does not support the splicing of multiple videos and has limitations on video duration. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple video splicing software options and is unsure which one to use for the task.
